title: Fellini Fellini \_ Amarcord FONT - HELP!!!!
content:
does anyone know which font is this? thank u

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10047638A~Fellini-Amarcord-Posters_4237.jpg)
author: FRENCHIE

comments.content:
Hello, from 7 years in (your postings) future.

YEs, the Amarcord fonts was hand drawn, and, if since '08 you haven't found this, this might help.

Someone has built the font - several iterations, actually.

Here's a link.

[https://darkvotum.wordpress.com/2014/11/19/improved-amarcord-font-fellin...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004719/https:/darkvotum.wordpress.com/2014/11/19/improved-amarcord-font-fellini-movie-title-typography/ "https://darkvotum.wordpress.com/2014/11/19/improved-amarcord-font-fellini-movie-title-typography/")

I hope - either 'back then,' or now, you found what you need(ed).

P.S., I'd love to know what ultimately happened.
